name: Radarr
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null; then docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q radarr && echo active || echo inactive; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active radarr || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null; then docker start radarr || true; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart radarr || true; fi
